runs.comm: what a ball to start with! Ntini pitches on  perfect length around off stump and angles the ball across the left-hander, Marsh gets squared up and beaten
Marsh dabs this one down to third man and sets off for a single
Warner's away! He jumps back and tucks a short of a length delivery off his hips behind square

Marsh gets squared up again and defends on the off side, Warner sets off for the single but there's some hesitation, not a good idea when de Villiers is the fielder at point. He sprints, picks up, dives, and throws but misses the stumps
Warner goes airborne! He stays in his crease and pulls a short ball from Ntini just over the head of the fielder at mid-on, the ball speeds to the boundary
played off the hips towards square leg again
short of a length outside off stump, Warner slaps the ball towards cover
too full, too straight, Warner leans across and flicks the ball towards the fine leg boundary, no sign of nerves from Warner
this one stops on Warner, he checks his shot down the ground and plays it towards mid-on
Marsh moves forward and defends a good length delivery towards point
shot! Marsh stays in his crease, waits for the length ball, and drives on the up straight past the bowler, the ball screams to the boundary
Marsh ends the over with a clip over midwicket, Duminy's in the deep
short of a length on middle and off stump, the batsman jumps back and defends on the off side
Ntini fires in a full ball and Warne absolutely smashes it towards mid-on, Morkel (Albie) does superbly to dive to his right and cut off the boundary
Albie won't get this! Oh yes he will! Terrific effort! Marsh drove it hard but hit it much straighter than Warner did, Albie sprinted to his right and dived full length, amazing!
massive! Ntini drops short and Warne swivels and smashes the ball over deep midwicket, he clears the boundary by a few yards!
Warner does it again! Ntini gives him another short one and Warner pulls again, he hits it squarer this time and clears the deep-square leg boundary by a yard or two
edged and four! Warner tries to blast down the ground but gets a thick outside edge past Boucher ... 18 runs off the over ... massive
Tsotsobe hits a good length outside off, Marsh pokes and gets beaten, the MCG can't believe it
Tsotsobe sprays the ball wide down leg side and Boucher saves a lot of runs with an acrobatic dive to his right

caught! It's Morkel again! Tsotsobe bowls a poor ball on Marsh's pads, he whips it hard but it's in the air and in the vicinity of Morkel lurking at short fine leg, he dives to his right and pulls off a low catch, that's Tsotsobe's first international wicket!
he gets off the mark by pushing off the front foot towards cover
Tsotsobe hits a good length outside off and, would you believe it, Warner lets it go! That's the first time he's done that today
Warner backs away to make room but Tsotsobe follows him, Warner pushes out at it and gets an edge down to third man
Ponting strides forward to a good length ball and pushes towards mid-off, Warner is eager to take the single but Ponting says no
super timing! Warner waits for the ball just outside off stump and brings his bat down in a flash to cut it through the gap at cover point
Kallis bowls a slower one and beats Warner's attempt at pulling
down the track and over midwicket! Warner steps out of a short of a length delivery and pulls into the wide open spaces at deep midwicket, Australia reach 50 ...
pushed off the front foot towards mid-on who is a little deep
Kallis bowls a slower one on off stump and Ponting tries to hit down the ground, he doesn't time it well and hits it in the air over the head of the fielder at mid-off
Ponting tries to whip a short of a length ball off his hips but gets an inside edge on to the pad
short of a length outside off stump, Ponting pushes forward and plays the ball towards third man

what a shot! That was bowled at 149.8 kmh and Warner merely turned around and helped the ball over the fine-leg boundary with an audacious paddle shot, fine leg was in the circle, Steyn can't believe it
52 off 19 balls! Warner gets there by charging and pulling the short ball high and far over deep midwicket, this guy has awesome hand-eye co-ordination, and terrific bat speed
played off the pads behind square for a single
dropped! Ponting smashes it right back at Steyn who can't hold on in his follow through
Warner backs away and has to wait for a short ball to reach him before swatting it towards cover
Ponting turns the ball off his pads for a single
he stays in his crease and flicks a flat and fast delivery towards deep square leg
tossed up a bit more and Ponting drives towards long-on for two more
Ponting stays in his crease and paddles the ball behind square
Warner steps out but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, he adjusts well and pushes towards cover
defended back to the bowler, Botha gave only 5 runs off the over
Ponting lofts down the ground and hits the ball high in the air, Botha sprints after it from mid-off and dives full length but still can't reach it
145 kmh, Ponting slashes at a short of a length ball outside off but misses, that's too wide
Ponting tries to pull Steyn but doesn't make contact, it looked like he was late on the shot
Ponting gets on to the front foot and flicks the ball off his hips over midwicket, Kallis dives in the deep
slower ball from Steyn at 114 kmh, Warner waits for it and taps towards cover for a quick single
Ponting moves forward to a good length ball and hits towards long-off, it was in the air but well short of the fielder
he can pull, can Warner! He lines up another short ball from Steyn and smashes it towards deep midwicket, the ball falls a few yards short of the boundary
Ponting steps out of the crease to take the ball on the full but hits it to midwicket
Botha bowls full and straight, Ponting hits towards midwicket again
Pontign gets down on one knee and sweeps towards deep midwicket

that's many many rows back! Warner charges Botha, he doesn't get to the pitch but never mind that, he winds up and swings his bat hard to send the ball over the long-on boundary, there's a fielder on the fence too!
played back to the bowler, Botha bowled a fast and full one
a full toss but Warner is cramped for room and hits it to midwicket
short of a length on the stumps, Ponting gets inside the line and chips the ball over short fine leg for four, delicate touch
Pontign misses the flick and gets hit on the pad, Warner sets off but Ponting sends him back, he would have been run out but Morkel missed at the bowlers end
caught! Ponting tries to clear the long-on boundary but doesn't quite make it, he holes out to Dale Steyn in the deep, it was a length ball and he hit it well, just not well enough for the MCG
Warner jumps back in his crease and plays the ball off his pads towards deep backward square
played down to third man for a single, Hussey's away
'Two, two,' yells Warner after tucking the ball towards midwicket, he gets them too, terrific running
Kallis bowls a slower one on a good length outside off, Hussey stays in his crease and dabs towards point
Warner tries to hit on the leg side but connects with the toe end of the bat and places the ball behind point
Warner misses the heave through midwicket and gets hit on the pad, Kallis appeals but he pitched outside leg
wind up and whack! Warner gets under a short ball and pulls it so powerfully, that's the biggest six of the day, it's gone miles over square leg, Gilchrist reckons it's 20 rows back
driven towards long-on for two more ...
clipped off the pads towards wide long-on for two more
steered towards third man for a single, over to Warner
bowled full outside off stump, Warner drives it hard towards mid-off but doesn't get the single
Warner steps out and makes room but Morkel follows him, he pulls through midwicket
Hussey backs away to hit the ball, I'm not sure where. He gets into an awful position and misses completely
Hussey makes room to a full ball on his stumps and drives through extra cover for two more

Morkel follows Hussey with a yorker as the batsman tries to make room, he nearly falls over as he hits behind square, they run one but Warner wants one more, Hussey sends him back and he has to dive full length to make it
Hussey tries to play the ball off his pads but doesn't make contact
smashed! Hussey makes room by moving towards leg, waits for a short ball from Botha and absolutely hammered the ball over the straight boundary, he freed his arms and hit that with immense power
full toss, played through midwicket for a single
Warner steps out and hits the full toss along the ground to long-off

is that maximum? No it isn't but it so nearly was. Hussey pulls a full toss high towards deep midwicket, de Villiers is on the boundary and he can't move back quickly enough, the ball bounces just inside the boundary and goes over
Hussey cuts a very short ball through point and wants the second, he has to hurry but beats the throw, he's in just before Boucher breaks the stumps

full toss and Warner goes after it! He pulls the ball from outside off into the gap between long on and deep midwicket, super placement and he moves four runs closer to a 100, he needs 10 off 14 to break Gayle's record for the fastest Twenty20 international hundred
Warner makes room by moving towards leg and smashes the ball over cover, he'll get two for this
Ntini bowls a full delivery outside off, Warner drives hard but doesn't get past Gibbs at cover

caught! Hussey makes room by moving towards leg and eventually has to reach out for the ball outside off stump, he hits it with the bottom of the bat and the ball lobs towards de Villiers at cover, that's a pretty easy catch to take

Warner's gone! He won't get his hundred on debut but he's done enough to get a standing ovation from the massive MCG crowd. Warner tried to lift Ntini off his pads but didn't quite get the power or the placement, he lofted the ball towards deep midwicket where de Villiers settled under the ball
White moves forward and defends Ntini's hat-trick ball towards mid-off
Hussey runs the ball down to third man to get off the mark.
Hussey defends, it's got a bit quiet after Warner's wicket
Hussey stays in his crease and rives through point for a single
nudged off the pads on the leg side
Hussey moves forward and drives through cover
well bowled! Botha gives White no space to work with, he hits the ball towards midwicket
dropped!! Hussey swats a full toss in the air towards deep midwicket, Duminy runs in from the boundary and slides to reach the ball, he gets there but can't quite hold on
turned off the pads behind square
White whacks one! Morkel bowls a full ball on leg stump and White simply uses the pace (and a little bit of his own muscle) to flick the ball over the long-leg boundary

caught! Another full ball, on middle stump this time, and White goes after it. He lofts the ball high towards the deep midwicket boundary. "Get up, get up" says Warner from the dug out but White hasn't hit far enough. Kallis runs to his left and takes a superbly judged catch, he looks down to see how far away from the boundary he is, he's alright!
driven off the front foot but straight to Gibbs at cover, no run there

slower ball from Morkel at 112 kmh, Hussey pushes towards mid-off and sets off for the single, Gibbs sprints from extra cover and intercepts, he throws himself into a full-length dive and hits the stumps direct at the bowler's end, there's no need for a replay
Ntini bowls a yorker and the batsman defends
another yorker and the batsman can't do much but defend towards the bowler
fuller length outside off stump, driven off the front foot through cover
Ntini delivers another one in the blockhole outside off stump, 139 kmh, Ronchi squeezes it out behind point
Hopes steps out and hits the ball towards midwicket
that's edged but four! Ntini bowls another full ball into the blockhole outside off, Ronchi brings his bat down in time and manages to edge it past Boucher
length delivery outside off stump, Hopes makes room and drives the ball through cover point
what a super shot! Ronchi makes room by moving towards leg and cuts a short of a length ball down to the third man boundary, similar to the one Tendulkar plays
driven firmly off the front foot towards long off

caught! Terrific effort from Ntini! Ronchi makes room again and slashes the ball high in the air towards third man, I think Ntini mis-judged it a bit and the ball looked like it was going to fall short off him. But he came in, dived forward and held the catch centimeters off the grass
Hopes makes room and drives the ball through point
full and wide outside off stump, Hopes lets it go
full toss on leg stump, flicked off the pads behind square
Morkel fires in the yorker but Hopes is up for it, he leans across and flicks firmly towards deep backward square leg
slower ball and Hopes winds up to hit it towards deep midwicket, two more ...
Hopes jumps down the track and makes room, Morkel follows him with a full ball angled into the pads, Hopes chips the ball into the gap at wide long-on for the third two in the over
terrific bowling! This time the yorker beats Hopes
Hopes moves outside leg stump and swings a full ball towards deep square leg, only the single this time, Hopes keeps strike for the final over
Hopes hits the first ball towards extra cover, he takes the single
slower ball outside off stump, Bracken swings but misses, Hopes has sprinted off for the bye and he makes it!
caught! Steyn bowls another slower one at 119 kmh, Hopes makes room to hit inside out over cover but gets beaten by the change of pace, he lobs a simple catch towards Botha
another swing and a miss, Bracken sets off for another bye and Boucher misses the stumps again
bowled him! Bracken moves outside leg stump to make room, Steyn bowls the ball fast, full and dead straight, he beats Bracken for pace and hits middle stump
Tait digs the yorker out towards midwicket for a single to end the innings
